About

Responsive

With around 80% of Americans now carrying pocket-sized computers everywhere they go; it's important as web developers, that everything we make & produce should be mobile friendly.

Intuitive

With a strong preference for easy to use UX/UI; I believe, as developers, we should always be designing & developing for the end-user. This means making things easier; not harder.

Dynamic

We've passed Web 1.0 & onward into Web 2.0. So, why make a website static and "boring". I love making pages come to life while keeping the concept of simplicity in mind with every project.

My name is Steven Shaw and I'm from Idaho; where we power our computers with potatoes.

I'm extremely passionate in what I do. I love designing and developing just as much as I love problem solving. I take pride in my work as we all should, never producing something that I'm not proud of.

I now reside in Houston, Texas, where everything is bigger. I love experiencing new opportunities and I believe this is the place to do so.
